timeline.bodyText:
This class is odd: It's acting like a @ConfigurationProperties, but it isn't one.
We prefer to avoid the use of @Value annotations in favor of @ConfigurationProperties classes that get injected where they need to go. Would recommend refactoring to fall in line with this pattern.
timeline.author: robzienert

replies.bodyText: I'm also worried (having not looked at the whole module) that you have a @ConditionalOnProperty annotation here, but then use it directly in S3SecretEngine's constructor, but have it typed as a required object. Depending on how the rest of the module is wired up, this could cause a runtime exception during startup.
replies.author: robzienert
